page.title: 01PORTHLEVEN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: Porthleven is a Cornish fishing village on the south west coast of Great Britain. We think we are very lucky to live in such a lovely village. People are friendly and most of us live near our relations, which we think is pleasant. Many of our homes have lovely views of the sea, the coast and the harbour. Fishing boats leave from and return to the harbour. It is not as busy as it used to be but there are about thirty small boats which mostly catch crabs. There are large beaches. During the summer we have many holiday makers. We enjoy having them, also they bring money to the area. During the summer the beaches are crowded. The only thing which worries us is cliff erosion.
